issue.title: colonist.io

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:

comment.body: @zloyden With AdGuard Base + the rule above, it doesn't show the ad boxes, but the site detects adblock, and doesn't allow playing (the behavior is the same as in the initial report).
